list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add support for custom domain "mini.man" in configuration
Updated the provisioning script, README, and documentation to include the new "mini.man" domain for accessing the web interface. Adjusted dnsmasq and Nginx configurations to support the custom domain, enhancing user accessibility and providing an alternative to the IP address.

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary:
Ensure noninteractive package installation and preconfigure iptables
Pre-configured iptables-persistent to skip interactive prompts and set the DEBIAN_FRONTEND to noninteractive to streamline package installation. This prevents installation scripts from pausing for user input, making the provisioning process fully automated.

Refactor iptables-persistent installation process
Separate iptables-persistent installation to ensure stronger prompt suppression and prevent user interaction. Added steps to generate default rules files and reinforced noninteractive settings for seamless deployment.

Replace iptables-persistent with custom persistence setup
Switched from iptables-persistent package to a custom solution for managing iptables persistence. Created a systemd service to restore rules at boot and adjusted the script to save the current rules accordingly. This change simplifies the setup and avoids dependency on iptables-persistent.

Set up runtime directories and enhance service configuration
Added proper runtime directory setup for Gunicorn to avoid permission issues. Enhanced Nginx configuration with default server and improved service environment variable settings. Included final checks to verify service status and handle common issues.

Add local static assets for Bootstrap and Chart.js
Replaced external CDN links with locally served Bootstrap, Bootstrap Icons, and Chart.js files. Updated base.html to reference these local assets, improving application performance and reliability.

Remove legacy provision.sh script
The provision.sh script was removed as it is no longer needed. The functionality it provided has either been deprecated or replaced by more efficient methods, reducing redundancy and maintenance overhead.

Remove legacy provision.sh script and improve static asset setup.
The provision.sh script was removed as it is obsolete, with its functionality either deprecated or replaced by better methods, reducing redundancy and maintenance burden. Additionally, enhanced the provisioning process to download and verify complete versions of static assets like Bootstrap, Bootstrap Icons, and Chart.js, ensuring reliability and consistency.

Add CDN support and fallback mechanisms for static assets
Implemented dual resource loading modes: production (local assets) and development (CDN with local fallbacks). Updated templates, configuration, and documentation to enhance flexibility and reliability in different environments.

Add profile template for user account details
Introduced a new HTML template to display the user profile page. The page includes sections for account information, user roles, and security features such as logout functionality. This template extends the base layout for consistency.

Enhance authentication, user management, and CSRF protection
Added user editing functionality for admins, ensured CSRF protection across forms, and refactored user registration and system reset handling for better validation and user feedback. Updates improve security, maintainability, and user experience throughout the application.

Add support for custom domain "mini.man" in configuration
Updated the provisioning script, README, and documentation to include the new "mini.man" domain for accessing the web interface. Adjusted dnsmasq and Nginx configurations to support the custom domain, enhancing user accessibility and providing an alternative to the IP address.

MESSAGE.value:
Ensure noninteractive package installation and preconfigure iptables
Pre-configured iptables-persistent to skip interactive prompts and set the DEBIAN_FRONTEND to noninteractive to streamline package installation. This prevents installation scripts from pausing for user input, making the provisioning process fully automated.

Refactor iptables-persistent installation process
Separate iptables-persistent installation to ensure stronger prompt suppression and prevent user interaction. Added steps to generate default rules files and reinforced noninteractive settings for seamless deployment.

Replace iptables-persistent with custom persistence setup
Switched from iptables-persistent package to a custom solution for managing iptables persistence. Created a systemd service to restore rules at boot and adjusted the script to save the current rules accordingly. This change simplifies the setup and avoids dependency on iptables-persistent.

Set up runtime directories and enhance service configuration
Added proper runtime directory setup for Gunicorn to avoid permission issues. Enhanced Nginx configuration with default server and improved service environment variable settings. Included final checks to verify service status and handle common issues.

Add local static assets for Bootstrap and Chart.js
Replaced external CDN links with locally served Bootstrap, Bootstrap Icons, and Chart.js files. Updated base.html to reference these local assets, improving application performance and reliability.

Remove legacy provision.sh script
The provision.sh script was removed as it is no longer needed. The functionality it provided has either been deprecated or replaced by more efficient methods, reducing redundancy and maintenance overhead.

Remove legacy provision.sh script and improve static asset setup.
The provision.sh script was removed as it is obsolete, with its functionality either deprecated or replaced by better methods, reducing redundancy and maintenance burden. Additionally, enhanced the provisioning process to download and verify complete versions of static assets like Bootstrap, Bootstrap Icons, and Chart.js, ensuring reliability and consistency.

Update IDE configuration and enhance offline setup
Simplified `.idea` configuration by adjusting comments, fixing encoding issues, and removing redundant settings. Improved module exclusions and clarified Python SDK definitions. These changes ensure better project organization, improved readability, and enhanced offline resource handling.

Add CDN support and fallback mechanisms for static assets
Implemented dual resource loading modes: production (local assets) and development (CDN with local fallbacks). Updated templates, configuration, and documentation to enhance flexibility and reliability in different environments.

Add profile template for user account details
Introduced a new HTML template to display the user profile page. The page includes sections for account information, user roles, and security features such as logout functionality. This template extends the base layout for consistency.

Enhance authentication, user management, and CSRF protection
Added user editing functionality for admins, ensured CSRF protection across forms, and refactored user registration and system reset handling for better validation and user feedback. Updates improve security, maintainability, and user experience throughout the application.

Add support for custom domain "mini.man" in configuration
Updated the provisioning script, README, and documentation to include the new "mini.man" domain for accessing the web interface. Adjusted dnsmasq and Nginx configurations to support the custom domain, enhancing user accessibility and providing an alternative to the IP address.
